meaning_str.bing:
n. 当地人；本地人；住处附近的酒吧；（工会的）地方分会
adj. 地方的；当地的；本地的；（身体）局部的

当地人；本地人；住处附近的酒吧；（工会的）地方分会
地方的；当地的；本地的；（身体）局部的

地方的；（身体）局部的；局域的；市内的（如市内公交车）；慢车的（指火车服务）
当地人；本地人；慢车；当地酒吧；市内公交车；地方分支；工会地方分会；地方机构；社区成员；地区代表

1.en: In a cluster setting, this HTTP namespace reservation must be established by a local Windows administrator on each one of the nodes.
1.cn: 在群集设置中，必须由本地Windows管理员在每一个节点上建立此HTTP命名空间保留。

2.en: with a 40% tariff and a 17% value-added tax on US fruit, its price will be at least five times that of local varieties.
2.cn: 由于从美国进口的水果含40%的关税和17%的增值税，所以其价格至少是当地产的各类水果的五倍。

3.en: A chief of the local Ada Narcotics Unit said the drugs had been mixed into the chocolate which was then said to be shipped to Mexico.
3.cn: 当地禁毒科的主要负责人说，这些毒品被混制在巧克力中并意欲运送往墨西哥。

0.en: Here in the U.S., if you can't get there on foot, you can get a ride to your local school, even if it's not that local.
0.cn: 在北国,如果走路不能到的地方你可以搭车去当地的学校，就算不是本地的也行。

1.en: That I invite the local criminals to drop in and strip the house bare?
1.cn: 把当地的罪犯都请进房子来洗劫一空吗？

2.en: I was a powerless and helpless boy, until a local sensei took me under his wing.
2.cn: 我当时是个无依无靠的男孩，直到当地的老师，收留了我。

3.en: Gentlemen, I am now about to send a signal from this laptop through our local ISP.
3.cn: 先生们，我现在要通过这台电脑发射一个信号，连接到我们当地的互联网服务供应商。

4.en: Oh, Mr. President, this is catching us all off guard over here. State, local, we had no idea.
4.cn: 总统先生，这让我们猝不及防。州里的，当地的，我们都不知道。

5.en: It also means they'll have more money to spend at local businesses which grows the economy for everyone.
5.cn: 这也意味着他们将有更多的钱在当地的商家进行消费这是在为每一个人发展经济。

6.en: So, what, you find yourself some local tail and you just completely forget what team you're playing for?
6.cn: 怎么你找了一个当地的马子，就忘了自己的身份了吗？

7.en: Then we'd go from there back to East London, we'd go to my dad's local football club where we'd play football for ages, for hours.
7.cn: 然后我们会从那回东伦敦，去我爸爸那只当地的足球俱乐部，在那我们会踢很久的球，几个小时。

8.en: When our nation started the interstate highway act, instead of having local commerce, we could get goods coast to coast, top to bottom.
8.cn: 当我们的国家开始实施了州际高速公路法案来代替当地的商业，我们可以获得商品东海岸到西海岸从上到下。

9.en: Anyway, the local cuisine was a little more sausage-based than I'm used to, and the result was an internal blitzkrieg, with my lower intestine playing the part of Czechoslovakia.
9.cn: 总之，当地的烹饪方法用的香肠比我习惯的多了一些，结果就是肚子里上演了陆军联合闪电战，我的大肠扮演的是捷克斯洛伐克。

10.en: It's a beautiful but challenging place to live. But the local Li Su people have been living here for more than a thousand years, adapting to living around these giant natural barriers.
10.cn: 但是当地的傈僳族人，在此生息已逾千年，适应了在天然屏障环绕之中生活。生活在这儿，环境优美却困难重重。

11.en: I started when I was two. Local spots mostly.
11.cn: 我两岁开始拍广告。大部分是地方广告。

12.en: We've sent an anonymous tip to the local authorities.
12.cn: 我们已经匿名举报给当地部门

13.en: Local young entrepreneur of the year, two years running.
13.cn: 本地年度青年企业家得主，连续两年。

14.en: We should get some rest. Find a local inn, or B&B nearby.
14.cn: 我们该去休息了，找家当地旅馆或是商务酒店。

15.en: We have to work together at every level, federal, state and local.
15.cn: 我们必须在每一个层面上都精诚合作，联邦，州以及当地政府。

16.en: The facility is hidden beneath the local power plant under military guard.
16.cn: 这个设备被藏在本地发电厂的地底，周围有军队守卫。

17.en: He taught me to think global when I was just local. He made me a wealthy man.
17.cn: 当我还是个草根时，是他教会我目光远大，是他让我变得富有。

18.en: That's on the Internet? No. No, I contacted the local affiliate in Greenville.
18.cn: 网上有吗？没有，我联系了格林维尔当地电视台。

19.en: The Agency's got a local safe house. You're gonna need it. Don't trash the place.
19.cn: 我们的机构在当地有个安全屋，你会用得着，别搞得太乱。
